net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.name: Type
net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.defaultValue: [r: if( WildCard>0, " WILD CARD ", "")][r: if( Perso>0, " PC ", " NPC")]

net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.name: Points
net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.defaultValue: [r: if( WildCard>0, " Bennies " + PtsDestin, "")] [r: if( PouvoirArcane>0, " Power " + PtsPouvoir , "")][r: if( PouvoirArcane>0, "/" + PtsPouvoirMax , "")]

net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.name: Etat
net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.defaultValue: [h: stateList = getTokenStates( "json", "Condition")][h:sList = ""][h, foreach(item, stateList, ""), if(getState(item)): sList=listAppend(sList,item)][r:sList]

net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.name: Attributs
net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.defaultValue: AG D{Agil} SM D{Intell} SP D{Vol} ST D{For} VI D{End}

net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.name: TalentsAg
net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.defaultValue: [r: if( Boat>0, " Boating D" + Boat, "")][r: if( Driv>0, " Driving D" + Driv, "")][r: if( FightPar>0, " Combat D" + Fight, "")][r: if( Lock>0, " Lockpicking D" + Lock, "")][r: if( Pilot>0, " Piloting D" + Pilot, "")][r: if( Ride>0, " Riding D" + Ride, "")][r: if( Shoot>0, " Shooting D" + Shoot, "")][r: if( Stealth>0, " Stealth D" + Stealth, "")][r: if( Swim>0, " Swimming D" + Swim, "")][r: if( Throw>0, " Throwing D" + Throw, "")]

net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.name: TalentsInt
net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.defaultValue: [r: if( Gambl>0, " Gambling D" + Gambl, "")][r: if( Heal>0, " Healing D" + Heal, "")][r: if( Invest>0, " Investigation D" + Invest, "")][r: if( Knowl != "", " Knowledge: " + Knowl, "none")][r: if( Notice>0, " Notice D" + Notice, "")][r: if( Repair>0, " Repair D" + Repair, "")][r: if( Street>0, " Streetwise D" + Street, "")][r: if( Survive>0, " Survival D" + Survive, "")][r: if( Taunt>0, " Taunt D" + Taunt, "")][r: if( Track>0, " Tracking D" + Track, "")]

net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.name: TalentsVol
net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.defaultValue: [r: if( Guts>0, " Guts D" + Guts, "")][r: if( Intimid>0, " Intimidation D" + Intimid, "")][r: if( Persuade>0, " Persuasion D" + Persuade, "")]

net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.name: Armure
net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.defaultValue: TE {Protete} TO {Protorse} BD {ProBD} BG {ProBG} JD {ProJD} JG {ProJG}

net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.name: Pouvoirs
net.rptools.maptool.model.TokenProperty.defaultValue: [r: if( pwArmure>0, " Armor", "")] [r: if( pwBarriere>0, " Barrier", "")] [r: if( pwAmiAnimaux>0, " Beast Friend", "")] [r: if( pwExplosion>0, " Blast", "")] [r: if( pwRayon>0, " Bolt", "")] [r: if( pwAugDimTrait>0, " Boost/Lower Trait", "")] [r: if( pwEnfouissement>0, " Burrow", "")] [r: if( pwSalve>0, " Burst", "")] [r: if( pwDeflexion>0, " Deflection", "")] [r: if( pwDetectCacherArcanes>0, " Detect/Conceal Arcanes", "")] [r: if( pwDissiper>0, " Dispel", "")] [r: if( pwManipElements>0, " Elemental Manipulation", "")] [r: if( pwEmpetrer>0, " Entangle", "")] [r: if( pwProtecElements>0, " Elemental Protection", "")] [r: if( pwPeur>0, " Fear", "")] [r: if( pwVol>0, " Fly", "")] [r: if( pwSoins>0, " Healing", "")] [r: if( pwSoinsAv>0, " Greater healing", "")] [r: if( pwInvisibilite>0, " Invisibility", "")] [r: if( pwLumiere>0, " Light", "")] [r: if( pwObscurite>0, " Obscure", "")] [r: if( pwPantin>0, " Puppet", "")] [r: if( pwRapidite>0, " Quickness", "")] [r: if( pwGarou>0, " Shape Change", "")] [r: if( pwEnchantArme>0, " Smite", "")] [r: if( pwParlerLangue>0, " Speak Language", "")] [r: if( pwVitesse>0, " Speed", "")] [r: if( pwOndeChoc>0, " Stun", "")] [r: if( pwTelekinesie>0, " Telekinesis", "")] [r: if( pwTeleportation>0, " Teleport", "")] [r: if( pwZombie>0, " Zombies", "")]

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
[h:tokens = getSelectedNames()] [h: assetId = getTokenPortrait()] [h,if(assetId == ""): assetId = getTokenImage()] [h,if(listCount(tokens) != 1): abort(0)] [h:token = listGet(tokens, 0)] [h:go = 1] [h,if(startsWith(token, "Lib")): abort(0)] [h,if(!isGM() && isNPC(token)):abort(0)] [frame("Character Sheet"): { Savage Worlds

EQUIPMENT:Armor
[r:token] Type: [r: if( WildCard>0, " WILD CARD ", "")][r: if( Perso>0, " PC", " NPC")]
[h: stateList = getTokenStates( "json", "Condition")][h:sList = ""][h, foreach(item, stateList, ""), if(getState(item)): sList=listAppend(sList,item)][r:sList] [r: if (WildCard>0, " Wounds -" + Blessures, "")] [r: " Fatigue -" + Fatigue, "")] [r: if( WildCard>0, " Bennies " + PtsDestin, "")] [r: if( PouvoirArcane>0, " Power " + PtsPouvoir, "")]
Agility: [r:"D" +Agil] Smarts: [r:"D" +Intell] Spirit: [r:"D" +Vol] Strength: [r:"D" +For] Vigor: [r:"D" +End]
Pace: [r:Mov][r:"+D" +Course] Parry: [r:Par+Bcl] Toughness: [r:Resist] Charisma: [r:Char]
Edges [r: Avantages]
Hindrances [r: Handicaps]
Skills AG: [r: TalentsAg]
Skills STR: [r: TalentsStr]
Skills SM: [r: TalentsInt]
Skills SP: [r: TalentsVol]
Powers [r: Pouvoirs]
Head: [r:Protete]
Left Arm: [r:ProBG] Torso: [r:Protorse] Right Arm: [r:ProBD]
Left Leg: [r:ProJG] Right Leg: [r:ProJD]
Weapons: [r: Arme]
Kits: [r: Sets]
Potions: [r: Potion]
Others: [r: Divers]
}]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Character Sheet

"tab0 | Equipment | | TAB |", "Equipement|" + Equipement + "|Kits", "Armes|" + Armes + "|Weapons", "Potions|" + Potions + "|Potions", "Special|" + Special + "|Special", "Brol|" + Brol + "|Stuff" )]
[h: setName(Nom)] [h, IF (WildCard > 0): status=input("PtsDestin|" + PtsDestin + "|Bennies")] [h, IF (Perso > 0): setPC()] [h, IF (Perso == 0): setNPC()] [h, IF (PouvoirArcane > 0): status=input("PtsPouvoirMax|" + PtsPouvoirMax + "|Maximum Power Points")] [h, IF (PouvoirArcane > 0): status=input("PtsPouvoir|" + PtsPouvoir + "|Actual Power Points")] [h: abort(Status)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Input

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Property = "Blessures"] [h: Value = Blessures - Healing] [h: Value2=max(0,Value)] [h: ID = getSelected()] [h: setProperty(Property, Value2, ID)] [h, IF (Blessures < 4): setState ("INCAPACITED",0)] [h, IF (WildCard <1 && Blessures < 1): setState ("DEAD",0)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Healing

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Property = "Blessures"] [h: Value = Blessures + Wound] [h: ID = getSelected()] [h: setProperty(Property, Value, ID)] [h, IF (Blessures > 3): setState ("INCAPACITED",1)] [h, IF (WildCard < 1): setState ("INCAPACITED",0)] [h, IF (WildCard < 1): setState ("DEAD",1)] [h, IF (WildCard < 1): Blessures=1]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Wounds

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Property = "Fatigue"] [h: Value = Fatigue + Tiring] [h: ID = getSelected()] [h: setProperty(Property, Value, ID)] [h, IF (Fatigue > 2): setState ("INCAPACITED",1)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Fatigue

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Property = "Fatigue"] [h: Value = Fatigue - Recovering] [h: Value2=max(0,Value)] [h: ID = getSelected()] [h: setProperty(Property, Value2, ID)] [h, IF (Fatigue < 3): setState ("INCAPACITED",0)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Rest

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Property = "PtsPouvoir"] [h: Value = PtsPouvoir + Increase] [h: Value2=min(PtsPouvoirMax,Value)] [h: ID = getSelected()] [h: setProperty(Property, Value2, ID)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Points +

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Property = "PtsPouvoir"] [h: Value = PtsPouvoir - Cost] [h: Value2=max(0,Value)] [h: ID = getSelected()] [h: setProperty(Property, Value2, ID)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Points -

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Property = "PtsDestin"] [h: Value = PtsDestin + Increase] [h: ID = getSelected()] [h: setProperty(Property, Value, ID)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Bennies +

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: Property = "PtsDestin"] [h: Value = PtsDestin - Decrease] [h: Value2=max(0,Value)] [h: ID = getSelected()] [h: setProperty(Property, Value2, ID)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Bennies -

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: setState("DEAD", 1)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Death+

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: setState("DEAD", 0)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Death-

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: setState("INCAPACITED", 1)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Out+

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: setState("INCAPACITED", 0)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Out-

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: setState("SHAKEN", 1)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Shaken+

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: setState("SHAKEN", 0)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Shaken-

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [H: i = getTokenImage()] [H: i1 = getTokenPortrait()] [H: i2 = getTokenHandout()] [H: setTokenImage( if( i == i1, i2, i1))] [H: abort(0)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Image

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [H: i = getTokenPortrait()] [H: i1 = getTokenPortrait()] [H: i2 = getTokenHandout()] [H: setTokenPortrait( if( i == i1, i2, i1))] [H: setTokenHandout( if( i == i1, i1, i2))] [H: abort(0)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Portrait

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: layerName = getLayer()] [h: layerName = if(layerName=="GM", "OBJECT", "GM")] [h: setLayer(layerName)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: O>>H

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!--fetch list of maps and PC token Ids [h:MapList=getAllMapNames()] [h:playerids=getPC()]
<!-- abort macro if nothing selected [h,if(playerids==""):cancel=0;cancel=1] [h:abort(cancel)]
<!--present drop down list of maps [h:Choice=input("MapChoice|"+MapList+"|Placer les PCs sur la carte:|List")] [h:abort(Choice)]
<!--lookup map name on map list [h:MoveToMap=ListGet(MapList,MapChoice)]
<!--send PC tokens to selected map [h,foreach(player,playerids):moveTokenToMap(player,MoveToMap,1,1)]
<!--change current map to new map [h:setCurrentMap(MoveToMap)]
All PCs moved to map -> [r:MoveToMap]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: PCs>

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!--fetch list of maps and PC token Ids [h:MapList=getAllMapNames()] [h:playerids=getSelected()]
<!-- abort macro if nothing selected [h,if(playerids==""):cancel=0;cancel=1] [h:abort(cancel)]
<!--present drop down list of maps [h:Choice=input("MapChoice|"+MapList+"|Placer la selection sur la carte:|List")] [h:abort(Choice)]
<!--lookup map name on map list [h:MoveToMap=ListGet(MapList,MapChoice)]
<!--send PC tokens to selected map [h,foreach(player,playerids):moveTokenToMap(player,MoveToMap,1,1)]
<!--change current map to new map [h:setCurrentMap(MoveToMap)]
All PCs moved to map -> [r:MoveToMap]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Select>
Z+
Z-

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: clearLights()] [h:status=input( "Zone|Cone,Small,Medium,Big|Effect Zone|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING" )] [h: setLight("Burst", Zone, 1)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Effects

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!--fetch list of PC token Ids
[h:playerids=getPC()]
<!-- abort macro if nothing selected [h,if(playerids==""):cancel=0;cancel=1] [h:abort(cancel)]
<!--set tokens to invisible [h,foreach(player,playerids):setVisible(0)] [h,foreach(player,playerids):setState("Invisible", 1)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Invis

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: clearLights()] [h:status=input( "Eclairage|Torch,Lamp,Candle|Light Type|LIST|SELECT=0 VALUE=STRING" )] [h: setLight("SW", Eclairage, 1)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Lights

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!--fetch list of PC token Ids
[h:playerids=getPC()]
<!-- abort macro if nothing selected [h,if(playerids==""):cancel=0;cancel=1] [h:abort(cancel)]
<!--set tokens to invisible [h,foreach(player,playerids):setVisible(1)] [h,foreach(player,playerids):setState("Invisible", 0)]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Vis

net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command: [h: clearLights()]
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: X
